DOC.brief_title: Six Month Study Evaluate Safety Effectiveness Intranasal Lacrimal Neurostimulator
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , single-arm , multicenter , open-label clinical trial participant use Oculeve Intranasal Lacrimal Neurostimulator stimulate tear production 180 day . Participants Screening Visit within 60 day prior initial device application . Device application initiate Day 0 , time participant receive train proper use device . Participants receive follow-up visit Days 7 , 30 , 90 180 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects moderate severe dry eye disease Literate , able speak English Spanish , able complete questionnaire independently Willing sign inform consent deem capable complying requirement study protocol Chronic recurrent epistaxis , coagulation disorder condition , opinion investigator , may lead clinically significant increase bleed Nasal sinus surgery ( include history application nasal cautery ) significant trauma Cardiac demand pacemaker , implanted defibrillator implant electronic device Diagnosis epilepsy Corneal transplant either eyes Participation clinical trial new active substance new device within 30 day Screening Visit Women pregnant , planning pregnancy , nurse Screening Visit
